entry.title: Tutorial for beginner
entry.summary: Hi There! Welcome to Intelligent Critical Care Center.
entry.content:
Hi There! Welcome to Intelligent Critical Care Center.

This blog will walk you through the resources and workflows provided by IC3 center and smooth your onboarding process.

On Boardingâ€‹

If you are not familiar with our organization, please visit our website firstly.

IC3 is a big organization and involves many researchers and roles. Except reporting and meeting with your supervisor routinely, you need to understand about the rules.

  • If you are working with Restricted Data, you need to be added into IRBs related to the project in advance. Please contact with your supervisor and refer to the document here.

The general tasks assignments for each cores are shown below:
